name: com.reachcloud.metaverse-cloud-sdk
description:
The Unity SDK for the Metaverse Cloud Engine

# Changelog

## 2.204.21
- Refactor upload logic to improve error handling and streamline bundle uploads

Updated on November 15, 2025

## 2.204.20
- Update AssetEditor and MetaverseAssetBundleAPI for improved upload handling and error management; upgrade .NETStandard version to 2.1 in dependencies

Updated on November 14, 2025

## 2.204.19
- Refactor scene saving logic to ensure open scenes are saved before building asset bundles

Updated on November 14, 2025

## 2.204.18
- Implement auto-save for open scenes before building asset bundles

Updated on November 14, 2025

## 2.204.17
- refactor: update EnsureUnityThreadAsync to use async/await pattern

Updated on November 14, 2025

## 2.204.16
- Refactor thread handling in LoginStore to ensure Unity main thread execution for async operations

Updated on November 14, 2025

## 2.204.15
- Refactor package update handling and improve GitHub API integration for package.json retrieval

Updated on November 14, 2025

## 2.204.14
- Enhance LoginStore and ClampTransformMagnitude functionality; add token persistence and clamping events

Updated on November 14, 2025

## 2.204.13
- Improve authentication error handling during asset upload

Updated on November 13, 2025

## 2.204.12
- Refactor dialog display logic in AssetEditor to use DisplayDialog instead of DisplayDialogComplex

Updated on November 13, 2025
author: Reach Cloud
